duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in executing a seamless financial planning process, covering a wide range of planning areas including Investments, Cash Flow Planning, Insurance Planning, Retirement Planning, Education Funding, Executive Compensation, Major Purchases, Tax and Estate Concepts.
Utilize information gathered by financial advisors during client meetings to create comprehensive financial plans and ensure data is updated in the CRM system.
Develop expertise in planning software and tools, and collaborate with the advisor and team to update plans for annual reviews.
Maintain client confidence and trust through meticulous attention to detail and preparation of client presentations and recommendations.
Drive research and make proactive recommendations for complex planning cases and unique scenarios.
Potentially participate in client meetings as the planning expert.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Finance, Economics, or a related field. CFP designation (or actively pursuing) and Insurance and Investment Licenses (or willingness to obtain within the first year)
